subject: Image Blending is now live in FLORA
body:
View this email in your browser (https://mailchi.mp/florafauna.ai/image-blending-is-now-live-in-flora?e=047ceaaedc)
Logo


** Two images. One vision.
------------------------------------------------------------
https://x.com/florafaunaai/status/1912968004800827772

Introducing Image Blending—now live in FLORA.

Seamlessly merge two images into one block.
Blend style, structure, and subject with natural language prompts.
Perfect for visual experimentation, stylistic fusion, and layered concepting.

Powered by Gemini 2.0 from Google DeepMind.

Whether you’re merging product shots with lifestyle scenes, or applying a painterly aesthetic to architectural renderings—this unlocks a new level of visual control.
Blend images in FLORA (https://www.florafauna.ai/projects)

https://www.instagram.com/florafaunaai/
https://x.com/florafaunaai?lang=en
